'''"Ceaseless Clash"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Ceaseless Clash" is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Basin of Unnumbered Flames}}.
